CONTRACT_ID: E6MON-23PQFL- Period 02 - RMSO Fresh Fruits and Vegetables
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Standby agreement for the purchase of fresh fruits and vegetables in Quebec
description: This is a Request for quotation for the purchase of fresh fruits in Quebec
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Title

The contract title for [Contract Number: WS3971410438- Doc3983311883](#contract-number) is E6MON-23PQFL- Period 02 - RMSO Fresh Fruits and Vegetables.

#### Background

Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites bidders to provide fresh fruits and vegetables through a Standing Offer (SO) agreement. The agreement aims to supply perishable commodities to the Government of Canada, specifically Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional Services of Canada, and Department of National Defense.

#### Solicitation and Tender

Solicitation Number: WS3971410438
Publication Date: June 06, 2023
Tender Closing Date: July 06, 2023
at 14:00:00 EDT

#### Tender Description
The tender is inviting bidders to submit their proposals for the supply of fresh fruits and vegetables. All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the deadline. Late bids will be declared non-responsive. The purchase is language-specific to the province of Quebec, except for the National Capital Region.

#### Contract Details

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Trading Agreements: Eligible under Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, and others.
* Regions of Opportunity: Quebec, except for the National Capital Region.
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except NCR)
* Regions of Opportunity: Quebec
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

#### Notice Information

* Notice URL: <http: //discovery.ariba.com/ rfx / 16109689?extsite = MTYxMDk2ODlfQU4wMTQ4 NDA 1 MDk5 M g ==>
* Contact Information:
    * Name: Ly, Selina (SPAC/PSPC)
    * Contact Info Email: selina.ly @ tpsgc - pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Other Details

* Expected Contract Start Date: None
* Expected Contract End Date: June 30th, 2044
* Tender Status has expired: This contract tender has expired.
* UNSPSC codes are 50300000 Fresh Fruits, 50400000 Fresh vegetables.
* Procurement Method: Competitive bidding.

### Important Note
This announcement is purely informational and does not constitute an offer or obligation on the part of the contracting entity. This announcement is available online
